org.fosstrak.reader.rprm.core.msg
Interface NotificationListener

All Known Implementing Classes:
ReadReportNotificationListener
public interface NotificationListener

NotificationListener is an interface that has to be implemented by all classes that are interested in the notification messages.

Author:
Andreas Fürer, ETH Zurich Switzerland, Winter 2005/06

Method Summary
 void notifyHost(ReadReport report, java.lang.String notificationChannelName, DataSelector ds)
          This method is called by the reader core to notify a listener that there is a new message.
 

Method Detail

notifyHost

void notifyHost(ReadReport report,
                java.lang.String notificationChannelName,
                DataSelector ds)
This method is called by the reader core to notify a listener that there is a new message.

Parameters:
report - The ReadReport to send to the Host.
notificationChannelName - The name of the NotificationChannel which is used to send the ReadReport to the Host.
ds - The DataSelector used for filtering the report.
